game.name: Eerie Dossier:the Haunted Apartment
game.shortDescription: "Eerie Dossier:the Haunted Apartment"is a walking simulation game that combines horror and horror elements.You will be trapped in an infinite loop of corridors and rooms, searching for opportunities to escape from this place while also discovering its secrets
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Eerie Dossier:the Haunted Apartment"is a walking simulation game that combines horror and horror elements.You will be trapped in an infinite loop of corridors and rooms, searching for opportunities to escape from this place while also discovering its secrets
